BBEX3.M.BYR.USD.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Belarus / USD 1 = BYR ... (middle)
General: A currency conversion took place with effect from 1 January 2000. The former currency, the (old) Belarusian rouble was replaced by the (new) Belarusian rouble at the rate of 1,000:1.
Source: National Bank of Belarus, Minsk.

Comment on 2009-01: On 2 January 2009, the Belarusian rouble was devalued. Calculated using the exchange rates from 31 December 2008 and 2 January 2009 (USD 1 = BYR 2,650.00) the Belarusian rouble was devalued by 17.0%.

Comment on 2011-05: On 24 May 2011, the Belarusian rouble was devalued. Calculated using the exchange rates from 23 May (USD 1 = BYR 3,155.00) and 24 May 2011 (USD 1 = BYR 4,930.00) the Belarusian rouble was devalued by 36.0%.

Comment on 2011-10: On 21 October 2011, the Belarusian rouble was devalued. Calculated using the exchange rates from 20 October (USD 1 = BYR 5,712.00) and 21 October 2011 (USD 1 = BYR 8,680.00) the Belarusian rouble was devalued by 34.2%.
